briefTitle: Ketotifen/Naphazoline Ophthalmic Solution in the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge Model of Acute Allergic Conjunctivitis.
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Double-masked, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Evaluation of the Onset and Duration of Action of KetoNaph Ophthalmic Solution in the Conjunctival Allergen Challenge (CAC) Model of Acute Allergic Conjunctivitis.
summary: The purpose of this study is to establish the safety and efficacy of ketotifen/naphazoline ophthalmic solution compared to vehicle and its individual components in alleviating the signs and symptoms of conjunctival allergen challenge (CAC)-induced allergic conjunctivitis.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 3, 5, and 7 minutes post challenge at 14 days
